full_description: Click the <bell's top center> on the table to create an SOS Morse code signal.
schema: {A} notifies the bell, {a} notifies the arm to click the bell to produce an SOS signal.
preference: Number of words should not exceed 15.
seen: Press <bell's top center> using {a} on the table to signal SOS.
